idea:
HealRxIN medicare pvt. ltd. aims to change the existing healthcare ecosystem in India
by providing healing ,wellness & treatment to people by all branches of medical science {eg medical , dental ,diagnostic, alternative therapies etc} by all available means under one connected units / clinics of the " HealRx " (trademark class 44 done ). Which will make primary healthcare a premium experience in an affordable cost .  
-HealRxIN strongly believes in MakeInIndia so has a team completely focused in research and development of Healthcare & Wellness Products so the need to buy either a substandard products at low price or high priced foreign imported goods is solved by HealRxIN providing High Quality Products healthcare & wellness products at an economical price .
-HealRxIN also aims at linking healthcare to digital platform of website & application which is constantly updating and upgrading with a focused group of software engineers and developers , which merely wont be an search engines for doctors or online consultation but will be utilized for much more deeper healthcare issues such as mental health (depression ,suicide)
-HealRxIN medicare pvt. ltd. is not just any other startup its a change India needs today to change the way healthcare is looked at in India
name: HEALRXIN MEDICARE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Anmolsathi.com is an Indian matrimonial site which provides matrimony service to all religions in India.

name: Green Power
